extension.news: [add] Saved Playlists [add] Audio only: Settings -> General [add] Age gate enforcement: Settings -> General [add] Quick search and Quick search (Incognito) - Settings -> Folders - incognito doesn't add to search history or run post play events (add to watch history) [add] Quick search to channels (no history) [add] Live folder to channels [fix] My Channel videos incl. private [fix] mpeg-dash vods, proxy required - Settings - MPEG-DASH - Thanks to Schtek for generating the needed mpd file [fix/upd] use select dialog for subtitle settings - [add] Configure subtitles: Settings -> General - [add] Current language with No auto-generated subtitles option [fix/upd] subtitles default to non asr track when possible [fix/upd] Watch Later - Clear: Settings - Folders - Custom Watch Later playlist id - Settings - Folders - Retrieve Watch Later playlist id [fix/upd] History - cannot add to history from add-on - Clear: Settings - Folders - Custom History playlist id [rem] SPMC mpeg-dash support [upd] Hebrew strings [Eng2Heb] [upd] Polish strings [Etharr] [upd] Italian strings [DjDiabolik] [upd] Hungarian strings [lacesz-sh]
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
